item.title: Population and Ethnic Leverage in Control of U.S. Senate
item.description: ## Please note: Alaska and Hawaii are being shifted and are not to scale. ## Getting data from the 2012-2016 5-year ACS ## Parsed with column specification: ## cols( ## NAME = col_character(), ## Q22018_GDP = col_double() ## ) Population Among States Was Unevenly Distributed in the First Census 1790 Population Density Table 1: States in 1790 State Population Proportion_US Cumulative Voters Proportion_Instate Cumulative_US Delaware 59,094 0.
